about_the_game:
Punk Wars: Hold the Line brings you a completely new survival-based game mode where you will have to endure the ever-growing waves of enemies hoping that you can overcome the pressure and finally strike a fatal blow to the enemy forces!



Face the incoming waves of enemies while carefully balancing between the constant need to increase your defense, expand your infrastructure, and make technological advances. Stay behind in any of these areas and all may end up being for naught!

Fight against any faction of your choosing. Gather your forces, men your positions and Hold the Line!

Features:



  • New Waves game mode – defend your city from the constant influx of new enemies that surround you from all sides!
  • Three new game maps, tailored specifically for Waves mode. Take advantage of the terrain and protect crucial passages that lead to your base!
  • Fights available in any 1v1 composition – face off against Steampunk, Dieselpunk, Atompunk, Steelpunk or Wastelanders!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu. Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 780 or equivalent with 2 GB of video RAM. A dedicated video card is required.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu. Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 3.6 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 or equivalent with 6GB of video RAM. A dedicated video card is required. For UHD resolutions GeForce RTX 2070 or better is recommended.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
